New Records: LeBron James scored a career-high 563 games with at least 30 points, surpassing Michael Jordan's previous record of 562.
Key Match Events: LeBron James hit a fadeaway jumper over Onyeka Okongwu to break Michael Jordan's record.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in his team's effort after the win.
The Lakers are 6-2 in James' eight starts since returning from injury and have moved six games over.500 for the first time since Nov. 19.
Miscellaneous Highlights: James finished with exactly 30 points on 13-of-20 shooting and eight assists in 30 minutes.
The Lakers won the game against the Atlanta Hawks with a score of 119-102.
